$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

icon-selected.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention to be used when selected (optional); make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

icon-half.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention to be used when selected (optional); make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette; v1.5.0+: If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding color in the array (0 based)

color-selected.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for selected icons

color-half.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons

no-dimming.desc: Does not lower opacity for unselected icons

no-reset.desc: When used, disables default behavior of clicking/tapping on icon which represents current model value to reset model to 0

tip-[index].desc: Slot to define the tooltip of icon at '[index]' (1-based); Suggestion: QTooltip

input.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model
